resources.string: This app needs you to allow this permission in order to function.
This app needs to use permissions display on other applications.\n\nPlease turn on in settings!

Explore the screen and let our
artificial intelligence translate for you,
making learning even easier and
more engaging.

To translate your screenshots, we request your permission to save the images on your device.

We guarantee the privacy of your data, which
will be used exclusively for this purpose!

To ensure full functionality, it is necessary to
grant permission to save the screenshots.

Please review your decision and
grant permission to continue!

To generate the screenshots, we request your permission to use the overlay feature.

This permission allows us to capture
the screen quickly and conveniently.
